channel.title: New dedi
channel.description:
New dedi Hi, I just purchased a new Dedi for $36. Its a Compaq Proliant DL380 http://www.trademe.co.nz/Browse/Listing.aspx?id=161469781 I'm having a problem installing Windows Server 2003 on it though. I insert the cd, turn it on. It starts the windows installer. (It loads the drivers, then stops at 'Windows is starting up'.) Any ideas about getting it to work? it has 2x18.2gb@10k rpm, im going to set up raid as soon as i get a ps/2 keyboard with a working f3 key.
Right now, Im downloading SmartStart 5.5 cd image. Will this help or not?

item.title: New dedi
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“RHS100, post:2, topic:216099”]what edition of windows 2003 server?

Standard Edition
R2 Enterprise Edition
Datacenter Edition[/quote]
screw it, i managed to get ubuntu on. (had to use minimal cd)

and it was R2 enterprise

Read full topic

item.title: New dedi
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

New dedi
Hi, I just purchased a new Dedi for $36.
Its a Compaq Proliant DL380

Trade Me

Compaq ProLiant DL380 Rack Mount Server

Rack mount with rails Single 733MHz PIII Processor (spare slot for second processor) 512MB RAM Hot plug redundant power supply On Board 10/100 Network Port ...


I’m having a problem installing Windows Server 2003 on it though.
I insert the cd, turn it on. It starts the windows installer. (It loads the drivers, then stops at ‘Windows is starting up’.)
Any ideas about getting it to work?
it has 2x18.2gb@10k rpm, im going to set up raid as soon as i get a ps/2 keyboard with a working f3 key.

Right now, Im downloading SmartStart 5.5 cd image. Will this help or not?

Read full topic
